languages.text:
Цели, получившие попадание из этого оружия, должны совершить проверку Ловкости на сопротивление. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженными{/g} на 1 раунд.
В конце своего хода обездвиженная цель должна выполнить проверку Ловкости на сопротивление. В случае успеха обездвиживание будет снято, а при провале цель получит <u>бонус ЛВК цели</u> прямого урона.
languages.original_text:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

traits.locale_text:
If the target fails on hit AGI check they becomes Immobilized for 1 round.
At the end of targets turn with a successful AGI check target removes Immobilized, on a failure receives Direct damage equal to AGI bonus of the target.

At the end of targets turn with a successful AGI check target removes Immobilized, on a failure receives Direct damage equal to AGI bonus of the target.

At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

languages.text:
Los objetivos que reciben el impacto de esta arma deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 asalto.
Al final de su turno, el objetivo afectado debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad para eliminar el efecto o sufrir daño directo igual a la <u>bonificación por AGI del objetivo</u>.
languages.original_text:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Los objetivos que reciben el impacto de esta arma deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 asalto.
Al final de su turno, el objetivo afectado debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad para eliminar el efecto o sufrir daño directo igual a la <u>bonificación por AGI del objetivo</u>.

languages.text:
この武器の攻撃を受けたターゲットは、敏捷抵抗判定に成功しなければ、1ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
自分のターン終了時、適用されたターゲットは効果を取り除くために敏捷抵抗判定に成功しなければ、<u>ターゲットのAGIボーナス</u>分の直接ダメージを受ける。
languages.original_text:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

traits.locale_text:
この武器の攻撃を受けたターゲットは、敏捷抵抗判定に成功しなければ、1ラウンドの間、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
自分のターン終了時、適用されたターゲットは効果を取り除くために敏捷抵抗判定に成功しなければ、<u>ターゲットのAGIボーナス</u>分の直接ダメージを受ける。

languages.text:
被这把武器命中的目标需要进行敏捷抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一轮。
目标回合结束时，需要通过敏捷抗性检定才能移除定身效果。若未能通过检定，则会承受等同于<u>目标敏捷加值</u>的直击伤害。
languages.original_text:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

traits.locale_text:
被这把武器命中的目标需要进行敏捷抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一轮。
目标回合结束时，需要通过敏捷抗性检定才能移除定身效果。若未能通过检定，则会承受等同于<u>目标敏捷加值</u>的直击伤害。

languages.text:
Mit dieser Waffe getroffene Ziele sind im Falle einer misslungenen Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.
Am Ende seines Zuges braucht das betroffene Ziel eine erfolgreiche Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit, um den Effekt zu entfernen. Andernfalls erleidet es Direktschaden in Höhe des <u>BEW-Bonus des Ziels</u>.
languages.original_text:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Mit dieser Waffe getroffene Ziele sind im Falle einer misslungenen Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.
Am Ende seines Zuges braucht das betroffene Ziel eine erfolgreiche Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit, um den Effekt zu entfernen. Andernfalls erleidet es Direktschaden in Höhe des <u>BEW-Bonus des Ziels</u>.

languages.text:
Les cibles touchées avec cette arme doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 round.
Au début de chaque tour, la cible affectée doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité pour se débarrasser de cet effet. En cas d'échec, elle subit des dégâts directs égaux à <u>son bonus d'AGI</u>.
languages.original_text:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Les cibles touchées avec cette arme doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 round.
Au début de chaque tour, la cible affectée doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité pour se débarrasser de cet effet. En cas d'échec, elle subit des dégâts directs égaux à <u>son bonus d'AGI</u>.

languages.text:
Bu silahın vurduğu hedefler, Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} geçirirler. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.
Etkilenen hedef, bu etkiyi kaldırmak için turunun sonunda Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde <u>hedefin ÇEV bonusu</u> kadar doğrudan hasara maruz kalır.
languages.original_text:

At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.
